name: lonely_planet
prompt: Astronauts discover a planet that mirrors human loneliness—it gets colder when people lie. Write their log entry after realizing the temperature keeps dropping.
decoded: "Log Entry: Day 10, Year 2150. The temperature continues to drop, and we realize that this planet mirrors human loneliness. It gets colder when people lie. We must remain open and honest to survive the harsh environment. Let's work together and communicate openly to stay warm."
